poems.Matsuo Basho: An old pond / A frog jumps in / The sound of water

poems.Yosa Buson: Winter solitude - / in a world of one color / the sound of wind

poems.Kobayashi Issa: The world of dew / is the world of dew / and yet, and yet...

poems.Takahama Kyoshi: First snow / falling / on the half-finished bridge

poems.Masaoka Shiki: The cicada's cry / drills into / the rocks

poems.Li Bai: The bright moon / lifts from the mountains' shadow / and stands alone in the sky

poems.Du Fu: Amidst the flowers / a jug of wine, / I pour alone - / no friend with me.

poems.Onitsura: Into the sea breeze / All the flowers / Of the wild cherry.

poems.Sojo Henjo: On a withered branch / A crow has alighted: / Nightfall in autumn.

poems.Kaga no Chiyo: On the white sand / A pillow of moonlight / In every direction.
